partintro.para: Cattle is a library implementing a flexible interpreter for the Brainfuck programming language.

The library allows one to easily embed a full-featured Brainfuck interpreter into any application; to make the interaction between the hosting application and the Brainfuck interpreter completely transparent, Cattle can be configured to use a custom set of I/O routines instead of the standard ones.
The behaviour of the interpreter itself is highly configurable, as to fit most needs.
The library is still under development, and some planned features are only partially implemented, or not implemented at all.
